msg.msgText: The client failed to establish a secure connection to Message Gateway because no security socket factory was found. This can happen if there is no default security socket factory available to the JVM.

msgExplanation.p: A secure connection can be established for the default security socket factory only if the JVM configuration includes a default security socket factory.

msgUserResponse.p: Contact your system administrator to request an update to the JVM configuration to include a default security socket factory.
